name: Seeker

skills.name: Devour
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

effects.notes: 2 hits, each hit 2.2x ATK. Books: +30% damage, +25% debuff chance.

skills.notes: Useful for Magma Dragon, Hydra, and Arena control.

skills.name: Tailwind
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 30%. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Grants an Extra Turn.
skills.notes: Key for speed tuning and Arena boosting.

skills.name: Dark Blood
skills.description: When critically hit, heals this Champion by 20% HP and places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. (Cooldown: 5 turns)

effects.notes: 60% Increase DEF for 2 turns when Seeker is critically hit.

skills.notes: Triggers on being critically hit. Great for Arena defense and survivability.

forms.aura: Increases Ally DEF in the Arena by 30%.
forms.comments: Seeker is a top-tier TM booster and defensive support for Arena, Clan Boss (2:1 speed tunes), and Doom Tower Magma Dragon. Provoke is key for Hydra and Magma Dragon. Extra turn on A2 enables fast cycling.

stat_priorities: Clan Boss: SPD, DEF%, C.RATE, C.DMG, HP%
Doom Tower: ACC (for Provoke), SPD, DEF%, HP%

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 220+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 250+ ACC (if needed), high DEF/HP
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 300+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, C.DMG, RES for tank

notes: Seeker is a meta-defining champion for Arena, Clan Boss (unkillable 2:1), and Doom Tower Magma Dragon. Build for high speed and survivability. Provoke requires ACC for PvE bosses. Extra turn on A2 enables fast cycling. Passive is key for go-second Arena teams.
